alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Gregg; Rusk; Smith; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:53AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SMITH...NORTHWESTERN RUSK... SOUTHEASTERN WOOD...SOUTHWESTERN GREGG AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM CDT... At 253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chandler to near Hawkins. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. A 45 mph wind gust was measured at Tyler Pounds Field with these storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Jacksonville, Henderson, Kilgore, Whitehouse, Lindale, Overton, Bullard, Troup, Hawkins, New London, Arp, Mount Selman, Joinerville, Mixon, Turnertown, Reese, Maydelle, Lake Palestine, and Liberty City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
